title-part.text: DISPENSING, DELIVERING OR TRANSFERRING LIQUIDS, NOT OTHERWISE PROVIDED FOR

reference.text: cleaning pipes or tubes or systems of pipes or tubes B08B9/02; emptying or filling of bottles, jars, cans, casks, barrels, or similar containers, not otherwise provided for B67C; water supply E03; pipe systems F17D; domestic hot-water supply systems F24D; measuring volume, volume flow, mass flow or liquid level, metering by volume G01F; coin-freed or like apparatus G07F

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Apparatus or devices for dispensing beverages on draught

title-part.text: Flow or pressure control devices or systems

CPC-specific-text.text: , e.g. valves, gas pressure control, level control in storage containers

modulating the opening of a valve
comprising means for detecting the size of vessels to be filled
comprising means for detecting the liquid level in vessels to be filled, e.g. using ultrasonic waves, optical reflexion, probes

comprising flow or pressure sensors, e.g. for controlling pumps

comprising means for making a mixture of gases
